mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(user_no) FROM addr WHERE user_no = #{user_no}) > 5 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END as is_over_limit FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDR (addr_NO, user_no, addr_post, addr_jibun, addr_road, addr_detail, addr_receiver, addr_name) VALUES (ADDR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{addr_post}, #{addr_jibun}, #{addr_road}, #{addr_detail}, #{addr_receiver}, #{addr_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ADDR WHERE addr_no = #{addr_no} AND user_no = #{user_no}
